attributes.action: Imprison those commiting acts of agression against NHS/Emergency services staff for at least two years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ensure that enshrined in criminal law is the provision for Judges to impose a custodial sentence against anyone carrying out an act of agression against an NHS/Emergency Services employee whilst they are carrying out their duties. The senetence should be at least for the duration of two years.
